text: Deborah Watling (2 January 1948 â€“ 21 July 2017) was an English actress. She was born in Loughton, Essex. She was known for her role as Victoria Waterfield, a friend of the Second Doctor in the BBC television series Doctor Who.A critical history of Doctor Who on television, John Kenneth Muir, McFarland & Co (1999), p.144 Watling died on 21 July 2017 from lung cancer in Frinton-on-Sea, Essex at the age of 69. ==References== ==Other websites== * *Deborah Watling's website *BBC Norfolk Online - RealAudio interview from the Holt Doctor Who Midsummer Invasion 2006 *The Spotlight: Deborah Watling *Deborah Watling (Aveleyman) Category:1948 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:Cancer deaths in England Category:English television actors Category:English movie actors Category:Actors from Essex
title: Deborah Watling
